useCase.name: Make a move in the Go game

mainSequence.step: Gracz clicks on a board position
Board processes the move including the current color
Board validates if the selected position is valid
Logic retrieves the color present at the selected position
Logic processes the move by adding a stone at the position for the current color if valid
Server is notified with the move coordinates
Server validates the move and responds to the board with the move acknowledgement
Board updates the state after the move
